verses.verse: After <WH310> these things <WH1697> the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto Abram <WH87> in a vision <WH4236>, saying <WH559>, Fear <WH3372> not <WH87>, Abram: I am thy shield <WH4043>, and thy exceeding <WH3966> great <WH7235> reward <WH7939>.

And Abram <WH87> said <WH559>, O Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, what wilt thou give <WH5414> me <WH1980>, seeing I go childless <WH6185>, and he <WH1931> that shall be possessor <WH1121> of my house <WH1004> is Eliezer <WH461> of Damascus <WH1834>?
And Abram <WH87> said <WH559>, Behold <WH5414>, to me thou hast given no <WH3808> seed <WH2233>: and <WH1121>, lo, one born in my house <WH1004> is mine heir <WH3423>.

And <WH1697>, behold, the word of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto him <WH559>, saying, This man shall not be thine heir <WH3423>; but he that shall come forth <WH3318> out of thine own bowels <WH4578> shall be thine heir <WH3423>.

And he brought him forth <WH3318> abroad <WH2351>, and said <WH559>, Look <WH5027> now toward heaven <WH8064>, and number <WH5608> the stars <WH3556>, if thou be able <WH3201> to number <WH5608> them <WH559>: and he said unto him <WH3541>, So shall thy seed be <WH2233>.
And he believed <WH539> in Jehovah <WH3068>; and he reckoned <WH2803> it to him for righteousness <WH6666>.
And he said <WH559> unto him <WH3068>, I am Jehovah that brought thee out <WH3318> of Ur <WH218> of the Chaldees <WH3778>, to give <WH5414> thee this land <WH776> to inherit it <WH3423>.
And he said <WH559>, O Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>, whereby <WH4100> shall I know <WH3045> that I shall inherit it <WH3423>?

And he said <WH559> unto him <WH3947>, Take me a heifer <WH5697> three years old <WH8027>, and a she-goat <WH5795> three years old <WH8027>, and a ram <WH352> three years old <WH8027>, and a turtle-dove <WH8449>, and a young pigeon <WH1469>.

And he took <WH3947> him all these <WH1334>, and divided them in the midst <WH8432>, and laid <WH5414> each <WH376> half <WH1335> over against <WH7125> the other <WH7453>: but the birds <WH6833> divided he not <WH1334>.
And the birds <WH5861> of prey came down <WH3381> upon the carcasses <WH6297>, and Abram <WH87> drove them away <WH5380>.
And when the sun <WH8121> was going down <WH935>, a deep sleep <WH8639> fell <WH5307> upon Abram <WH87>; and <WH367>, lo, a horror of great <WH1419> darkness <WH2825> fell upon him <WH5307>.

And he said <WH559> unto Abram <WH87>, Know <WH3045> of a surety <WH3045> that thy seed <WH2233> shall be sojourners <WH1616> in a land <WH776> that is not theirs <WH5647>, and shall serve them <WH6031>; and they shall afflict them four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141>;
and also that nation <WH1471>, whom they shall serve <WH5647>, will I judge <WH1777>: and afterward <WH310> shall they come out <WH3318> with great <WH1419> substance <WH7399>.
But thou shalt go <WH935> to thy fathers <WH1> in peace <WH7965>; thou shalt be buried <WH6912> in a good <WH2896> old age <WH7872>.
And in the fourth <WH7243> generation <WH1755> they shall come hither <WH2008> again <WH7725>: for the iniquity <WH5771> of the Amorite <WH567> is not yet <WH2008> full <WH8003>.

And it came to pass <WH8121>, that, when the sun went down <WH935>, and it was dark <WH5939>, behold <WH6227>, a smoking furnace <WH8574>, and a flaming <WH784> torch <WH3940> that passed <WH5674> between <WH996> these pieces <WH1506>.

In that <WH1931> day <WH3117> Jehovah <WH3068> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with Abram <WH87>, saying <WH559>, Unto thy seed <WH2233> have I given <WH5414> this land <WH776>, from the river <WH5104> of Egypt <WH4714> unto the great <WH1419> river <WH5104>, the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578>:
the Kenite <WH7017>, and the Kenizzite <WH7074>, and the Kadmonite <WH6935>,
and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, and the Rephaim <WH7497>,
and the Amorite <WH567>, and the Canaanite <WH3669>, and the Girgashite <WH1622>, and the Jebusite <WH2983>.
